briefTitle: Study of US-ATG-F to Prevent Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease (GVHD)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Key Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients designated to undergo allogeneic peripheral blood or bone marrow stem cell transplantation following the diagnosis of one of the primary diseases in early or intermediate disease status (i.e., acute myeloid leukemia, acute lymphoid leukemia, and myelodysplastic syndrome)
* Patients with an unrelated HLA-A,-B, -C and -DRBI matched donor
* Patients with a Karnofsky Performance Score â‰¥ 70%

Key Exclusion Criteria:

* Clinically significant concomitant diseases (i.e., cardiac, pulmonary, renal and CNS)
* Bacterial, viral, or fungal infections
* Known positive for Hepatitis B surfaces antigen, or Hepatitis C antibody, or who have been tested positive for HIV
* Patients with any concurrent malignancy. Cancer treated with curative intent \< 5 years previously will not be allowed except for patients with resected basal cell carcinoma or treated cervical carcinoma in situ
* Known contraindications to the administration of rabbit immunoglobulin antibodies
* Hypersensitivity to methylprednisolone, tacrolimus, methotrexate or any excipients contains in these products

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With First Occurrence of Moderate to Severe Chronic GVHD According to 2005 NIH Criteria as Determined by the Independent Endpoint Committee or Death From Any Cause After Allogeneic Stem Cell Transplantation
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with first occurrence of moderate to severe chronic GVHD according to 2005 NIH criteria as determined by the Independent Endpoint Committee or death from any cause after allogeneic stem cell transplantation, with a target of 124 total events of moderate or severe chronic GVHD, or death from any cause

outcomeMeasures.title: Overall Survival
outcomeMeasures.description: Incidence of death from any cause

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Chronic GVHD Mild to Severe
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with the first occurrence of mild to severe chronic GVHD according to 2005 NIH criteria as determined by the Investigators, with death and re transplantation as competing risks

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Chronic GVHD Moderate to Severe
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with the first occurrence of moderate to severe chronic GVHD according to 2005 NIH criteria as determined by the Investigators, with death and re transplantation as competing risks

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Chronic GVHD Severe
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with the first occurrence of severe chronic GVHD according to 2005 NIH criteria as determined by the Investigators, with death and re transplantation as competing risks

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Acute GVHD Grade I-IV
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with the first occurrence of acute GVHD grade I-IV as determined by the Investigators, with death and re transplantation as competing risks

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Acute GVHD Grade II-IV
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with the first occurrence of acute GVHD grade II-IV as determined by the Investigators, with death and re transplantation as competing risks

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Acute GVHD Grade III-IV
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with the first occurrence of acute GVHD grade III-IV as determined by the Investigators, with death and re transplantation as competing risks

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Relapse
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with relapse or disease recurrence, with death as competing risk

outcomeMeasures.title: Disease-free Survival
outcomeMeasures.description: Incidence of relapse or death

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Transplant Related Mortality
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with transplant related mortality

outcomeMeasures.title: Systemic Immunosuppressive Medication for Treatment of Moderate to Severe Chronic GVHD
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants who started on systemic immunosuppressive medicine for treatment of moderate to severe chronic GVHD as determined by the Investigator, with death and re-transplantation as competing risks

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With First Occurrence of Moderate or Severe Chronic GVHD According to 2005 NIH Criteria as Determined by Principal Investigator or Death From Any Cause After Allogeneic Stem Cell Transplantation
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with first occurrence of moderate to severe chronic GVHD according to 2005 NIH criteria as determined by the Investigators or death from any cause after allogeneic stem cell transplantation, with a target of 124 total events of moderate or severe chronic GVHD or death

outcomeMeasures.title: Moderate to Severe Chronic GVHD-free, Relapse-free Survival (GRFS)
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with moderate to severe chronic GVHD according to 2005 NIH criteria as determined by the Independent Endpoint Committee, relapse or death from any cause

outcomeMeasures.title: Grade III-IV Acute GVHD-free, GRFS
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with grade III-IV acute GVHD as determined by the Investigator, moderate to severe chronic GVHD according to 2005 NIH criteria as determined by the Independent Endpoint Committee, relapse or death from any cause

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With First Occurrence of Moderate to Severe Chronic GVHD or Death From Any Cause by Conditioning Regimen
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with first occurrence of moderate to severe chronic GVHD according to 2005 NIH criteria as determined by the Independent Endpoint Committee or death from any cause after allogeneic stem cell transplantation, with a target of 124 total events of moderate or severe chronic GVHD, or death from any cause. Analysis was conducted by conditioning regimen.

outcomeMeasures.title: Moderate to Severe Chronic GVHD-free, Relapse-free Survival (GRFS) by Conditioning Regimen
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with moderate to severe chronic GVHD according to 2005 NIH criteria as determined by the Independent Endpoint Committee, relapse or death from any cause. Analysis was conducted by conditioning regimen.

outcomeMeasures.title: Grade III-IV Acute GVHD-free GRFS by Conditioning Regimen
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with grade III-IV acute GVHD as determined by the Investigator, moderate to severe chronic GVHD according to 2005 NIH criteria as determined by the Independent Endpoint Committee, relapse or death from any cause. Analysis was conducted by conditioning regimen.

outcomeMeasures.title: Overall Survival by Conditioning Regimen
outcomeMeasures.description: Incidence of death from any cause. Analysis was conducted by conditioning regimen.

outcomeMeasures.title: Chronic GVHD Mild to Severe by Conditioning Regimen
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with the first occurrence of mild to severe chronic GVHD according to 2005 NIH criteria as determined by the Investigators, with death and re transplantation as competing risks. Analysis was conducted by conditioning regimen.

outcomeMeasures.title: Chronic GVHD Moderate to Severe by Conditioning Regimen
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with the first occurrence of moderate to severe chronic GVHD according to 2005 NIH criteria as determined by the Investigators, with death and re transplantation as competing risks. Analysis was conducted by conditioning regimen.

outcomeMeasures.title: Chronic GVHD Severe by Conditioning Regimen
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with the first occurrence of severe chronic GVHD according to 2005 NIH criteria as determined by the Investigators, with death and re transplantation as competing risks. Analysis was conducted by conditioning regimen.

outcomeMeasures.title: Acute GVHD Grade I-IV by Conditioning Regimen
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with the first occurrence of acute GVHD grade I-IV as determined by the Investigators, with death and re transplantation as competing risks. Analysis was conducted by conditioning regimen.

outcomeMeasures.title: Acute GVHD Grade II-IV by Conditioning Regimen
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with the first occurrence of acute GVHD grade II-IV as determined by the Investigators, with death and re transplantation as competing risks. Analysis was conducted by conditioning regimen.

outcomeMeasures.title: Acute GVHD Grade III-IV by Conditioning Regimen
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with the first occurrence of acute GVHD grade III-IV as determined by the Investigators, with death and re transplantation as competing risks. Analysis was conducted by conditioning regimen.

outcomeMeasures.title: Relapse by Conditioning Regimen
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with relapse or disease recurrence, with death as competing risk. Analysis was conducted by conditioning regimen.

outcomeMeasures.title: Disease-free Survival by Conditioning Regimen
outcomeMeasures.description: Incidence of relapse or death. Analysis was conducted by conditioning regimen.

outcomeMeasures.title: Transplant-related Mortality by Conditioning Regimen
outcomeMeasures.description: Participants with transplant related mortality. Analysis was conducted by conditioning regimen.
